name: XMAS RUSH: Snow, Race & Gifts
description:
Choose your side. Save Christmas and New Year or steal a holiday?) Santa Claus or Bad Santa? Get on your sleigh, cool SUV 4x4 or fuel Rocket and race for the gifts !!! In 2019!

Amazing battle of Good vs Evil in the pursuit of gifts! With dynamic music bits. Who will get more gifts?! Help your team!

◉ Get away from chasing enemies
◉ Collect gifts as much as you can
◉ Leaderboards
◉ Cool bits and graphics
1. Challenge - get even more gifts.
2. Keep your enemies on the tail and double your combo.
3. Maneuver and get as many points as you can!

◉ Top - every week.
◉ Do not forget, the speed and maneuverability of the sled and cars are different!

Enter the top list and become the best in your team!

Support us - enjoy to play and happy new year and merry christmas!

All questions on the game here: yopsltd@gmail.com
